thread.title: The Internet Blasts The Pro Football Hall Of Fame For Snubbing Terrell Owens For Second Year In A Row
thread.title_full: The Internet Blasts The Pro Football Hall Of Fame For Snubbing Terrell Owens For Second Year In A Row

author: Jorge Alonso
title: The Internet Blasts The Pro Football Hall Of Fame For Snubbing Terrell Owens For Second Year In A Row
text:
Terrell Owens has apparently been snubbed by the Pro Football Hall Of Fame for the second year in a row. 
Unfortunately I DID NOT MAKE IT again this year. Thanks to ALL my fans & supporters. #FlawedProcess 
— Terrell Owens (@terrellowens) February 4, 2017 

It’s pretty crazy that Owens is the only behind Jerry Rice in career receiving yards yet somehow is deemed not worthy of being in Canton.
If you really don't think Terrell Owens is a Hall of Famer, you probably shouldn't have a Hall of Fame vote.
— Joe Giglio (@JoeGiglioSports) February 5, 2017 


Terrell Owens really didn't make the HOF because the media portrayed him as a bad guy.. The man is a top 3 WR ALL TIME
— Hollygrove Monster (@brohaannn) February 5, 2017 
The NFL has a vendetta against Terrell Owens. He's blacklisted.
#2 in receiving yards 
#5 in Touchdowns
#8 in receptions
— Terell Evans (@Evanst87) February 5, 2017 


Terrell Owens still didn't make the HoF?? What a fucking joke
— Sean Riley (@Gametime490) February 5, 2017 
The voters spent 32 mi utes talking about Terrell Owens. That discussion should've been less than a minute. https://t.co/gkC6haPKqj 
— Brandon (@BrandonM_29) February 5, 2017 


Terrell Owens not getting into the hall of fame this year is nonsense
— cody (@no_stretch_zone) February 5, 2017 
Terrell Owens not mking the HOF is 100% a disgrace.
— NFL Update (@MySportsUpdate) February 5, 2017 


Someone explain to me how Terrell Owens is not in the Hall of Fame
— mason (@MasonGambino10) February 5, 2017
